data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 57 believers in Maldives and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Maldives
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the country of Maldives. Please, stir the 57 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.section_summary: On average, 17 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Maldives.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Maldives, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Maldives, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 57 believers in Maldives to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Maldives to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: the country of Maldives has (about) 57 people who know Jesus, 109 people who know about him culturally, and 540,834 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the country of Maldives has a population of 541,000.

We estimate Maldives has 57 people who might know Jesus, 109 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 540,834 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9,491 neighbors who need Jesus.
